markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Zombie Dragon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1378)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The rotted husk of a once great dragon, this abomination has lost all its former splendor, but none of the ferocity. Its patchy, rotted wings don't generate enough lift to keep it aloft, but the foul necromantic energies animating it still allow it to fly, albeit slowly.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 26

**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Zombie_DragonZombie.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Zombie Dragon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1378)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Dragon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=50" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=245" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 303</row>

**Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A zombie dragon is permanently [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) and can't use reactions

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +16 

</row>

**HP** 210
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Weaknesses** positive 10, slashing 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, fly 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
upper jaw +21 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+12 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+12 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +19 ([reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+10 bludgeoning

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The zombie dragon breathes a wave of fetid viscera that deals 5d6 bludgeoning and 5d6 poison damage (DC 28 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that critically fails is also [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). The zombie dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-103" />
name: Zombie Dragon

text: Zombie Dragon The rotted husk of a once great dragon, this abomination has lost all its former splendor, but none of the ferocity. Its patchy, rotted wings don't generate enough lift to keep it aloft, but the foul necromantic energies animating it still allow it to fly, albeit slowly. A creature that critically fails is also sickened 2. The zombie dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.
